txt.en: The burial mound looks recently exhumed
The Wargs have free reign of the unguarded lands of Annúndir, especially upon the toothed hill of Haudh Eglan.
The Wargs have free reign of the unguarded lands of Annúndir, especially upon the toothed hill of Haudh Eglan.\n\nYou should defeat the Wargs of Annúndir and investigate Haudh Eglan.
Haudh Eglan lies north of a cliff called \qAmlaith's Scar,\q which likewise lies west of Ost Lagoros in Annúndir.\n\nYou should defeat Wargs and search Haudh Eglan.
'You found evidence of digging among the Wargs at that large mound? That's very strange. I wonder if they found what they were looking for?\n\n'I wonder what it is they seek....'
Defeat Wargs in Annúndir and investigate Haudh Eglan
Orthonn can be found at Ost Lagoros, bordering the eastern edge of Annúndir (across the river).\n\nYou should bring news of Haudh Eglan to Orthonn.

'The Wargs have gathered among the ancient burial-mounds in far northern Annúndir. Return to Amlaith's Scar, where you found my chest, and continue north to Haudh Eglan.\n\n'If you search the top of the largest mound, you might find some sign that can tell us why they have come to Annúndir. Perhaps then we will know how to get them to leave.'

'You found evidence of digging among the Wargs at that large mound? That's very strange. I wonder if they found what they were looking for?

'Were they searching for the bones of some dead warrior? I have no idea, but I confess that the idea has given me the chills.

'Amarion looks displeased about something. More displeased than usual, I should say. I wonder what he's seen?'
Search the burial mound of Haudh Eglan
Haudh Eglan lies north of a cliff called \qAmlaith's Scar,\q which likewise lies west of Ost Lagoros in Annúndir.\n\nYou should defeat Wargs and search Haudh Eglan.
